operatingsystemcompatibility: Supported OS: Windows 2000/ Windows 2003/Windows XP/ Windows Vista/ Windows 7; Supported Browser: Internet Explore 8 or higher; Processor: Pentium 4 2.8GHz (or equivalent AMD); Graphic Card: 256 MB RAM Graphic Cards (or Equivalent on-board Graphic Cards); RAM: 2GB; Management Software (Viewing and recording up to 16 cameras)
securityfeatures: Password Protection; HTTPS Encryption; 64/128/152-bit WEP / WPA / WPA2,WPA-PSK / WPA2-PSK
protocols: TCP/IP; DHCP; PPPoE; ARP; ICMP; FTP; SMTP; DNS; NTP; UPnP; RTSP; RTP; RTCP; HTTP; TCP; UDP; 3GPP; ISMA
